gather: Title of special page shown on Special:SpecialPages for viewing your own lists.
gatherlists: Title of special page shown on Special:SpecialPages that allows you to view all publicly created lists.
gather-lists-showhidden: Link title to show hidden lists on [[Special:GatherLists]].
gather-lists-showvisible: Link title to show visible lists on [[Special:GatherLists]].
gather-lists-collection-owner:
Table column header in a list of all collections. The column will list usernames of people who own collection.
{{Identical|Owner}}
gather-lists-collection-last-updated:
Label for last updated time of a collection
{{Identical|Last updated}}
gather-lists-collection-title:
Label for title of collection on list of all collections
{{Identical|Title}}
gather-lists-collection-description:
Label for description of collection on list of all collections
{{Identical|Description}}
gather-lists-collection-count:
Label for count of collection on list of all collections
{{Identical|Count}}
gather-lists-hide-collection-label:
Label for button that performs moderation hide action which sets list from public to hidden.
{{Identical|Hide}}
gather-lists-hide-collection:
Label asking for confirmation when hiding a user's collection for moderation purposes. Parameters:
* $1 - Title of the collection.
* $2 - User name of the owner.
gather-lists-hide-success-toast:
Label for toast displaying that specified list was hidden successfully. Parameters:
* $1 - Title of the collection.
gather-lists-hide-failure-toast:
Label for toast diaplaying that hiding specified list failed. Parameters:
* $1 - Title of the collection.
gather-lists-show-collection-label:
Label for button that performs moderation reveal/show action which resets list from hidden to public.
{{Identical|Reveal}}
gather-lists-show-collection:
Label asking for confirmation when revealing a user's collection for moderation purposes. Parameters:
* $1 - Title of the collection.
* $2 - User name of the owner.
gather-lists-show-success-toast:
Label for toast displaying that specified list was shown successfully. Only shown to admins. Parameters:
* $1 - Title of the collection.
gather-lists-show-failure-toast:
Label for toast diaplaying that showing specified list failed. Only shown to admins. Parameters:
* $1 - Title of the collection.
gather-editfeed-show: Label for button that toggles list on feed of edits.
gather-editfeed-title: Title for page that allows you to view edits inside a collection.
gather-editfeed-empty: Message that shows when no edits have been made recently to any pages inside a collection.
gather-remove-from-collection-failed-toa: Error message displayed to user when remove from collection action fails.
gather-add-to-collection-failed-toast: Error message displayed to user when add to collection action fails
gather-edit-collection-label-name:
Label above input field for name of collection
{{Identical|Name}}
gather-edit-collection-label-description:
Label above input field for description of collection
{{Identical|Description}}
gather-edit-collection-label-privacy: Label next to checkbox for making collection private.
gather-edit-collection-save-label:
Label for save button in collection editor.
{{Identical|Done}}
gather-edit-collection-failed-error: There was a problem saving the changes.
gather-delete-collection-confirm: Text under the heading asking the user if they would like to delete a collection.
gather-delete-collection-delete-label:
Label for delete button in delete overlay.
{{Identical|Delete}}
gather-delete-collection-cancel-label:
Label for cancel button in delete overlay.
{{Identical|Cancel}}
gather-delete-collection-success: Toast message indicating that deletion was successful.
gather-delete-collection-failed-error: Toast error indicating there was a problem deleting the collection.
gather-error-unknown-collection: Error message test when you try to edit a collection you do not own or that does not exist.
gather-collection-member: Alternative text displayed next to collection name when page is a member.
gather-collection-non-member: Alternative text displayed next to collection name when page is not a member.
gather-anon-cta: Message that shows to anonymous users when they click the add to collection button.
gather-create-new-button-label:
Label for a button that is used to create a new collection.
{{Identical|Create}}
gather-add-new-placeholder: Placeholder text for input field for new collection.
gather-add-to-new: Heading that shows in the watchstar content overlay above a form to create a new public collection.
gather-add-to-existing: Heading that shows in the watchstar content overlay above a list of your existing collections.
gather-add-toast:
Message displayed when you add an item to a collection. Parameters:
* $1 - Name of collection.
gather-new-collection-failed-toast:
Message displayed when creating a new collection fails. Parameters:
* $1 - Name of collection.
gather-add-failed-toast:
Message displayed when adding an item to a collection fails. Parameters:
* $1 - Name of collection.
gather-add-title-invalid-toast: Message displayed to a user when editing or creating a collection fails because of an invalid title.
gather-add-to-collection-summary:
Text for a tutorial overlay presented to a user the first time they see the collections watchstar asking them if they would like to add the current page to a collection.

Parameters:
* $1 - page title
gather-add-to-collection-confirm: Label for button that user can click if they would like to add the current page to a collection
gather-add-to-collection-cancel:
Label for button that user can click if they do not want to add to a collection.
{{Identical|No thanks}}
gather-remove-toast:
Message displayed when you remove an item from a collection. Parameters:
* $1 - Name of collection.
gather-no-such-action: Message used, if thse user tried to request a non-existent action on a collection.
gather-unknown-error: Used as an error message, if there was an unknown error.
gather-loginpage-desc: User friendly description of Gather on mobile [[Special:UserLogin]] page.
gather-no-public-lists-title: The title of the view shown when there are no public collections for a user.
gather-no-public-lists-description: The descriptive text explaining that there are no public collections for a user.
gather-page-not-found: Text in place of the collection excerpt explaining that the page does not exist
gather-anon-view-lists: Text shown when trying to see your own collections on [[Special:Gather]] but the user is not logged in.
gather-watchlist-title:
Title used for special casing the Watchlist collection on the [[Special:Gather]] page.
{{Identical|Watchlist}}
gather-watchlist-description: Default description for special casing the Watchlist collection on the [[Special:Gather]] page.
gather-lists-title:
Title for [[Special:Gather]] when displaying user curated lists.
{{Identical|Collection}}
gather-lists-from-user-title:
Title for [[Special:Gather]] when displaying user curated lists for a known user.
Parameters: $1 - name of user who collections belong to.
gather-read-more:
Label for the read more link used on [[Special:Gather]].
{{Identical|Read more}}
gather-private:
Label for a collection when it is not publicly visible
{{Identical|Private}}
gather-public:
Label for a collection when it is publicly visible
{{Identical|Public}}
gather-empty: Message shown on an empty rendered collection on [[Special:Gather]].
gather-empty-footer:
Footnote shown on an empty collection on [[Special:Gather]] which instructs to the user how to add articles to a collection on their wiki. 
Parameters: $1 - Name of site
gather-edit-button:
Label for a button that enables editing a collection.
{{Identical|Edit}}
gather-delete-button:
Label for a button that enables deleting a collection.
{{Identical|Delete}}
right-gather-hidelist:
With gather, users can create lists and make them public. This right gives admins a way to hide or restore a list that violates WP policy.

{{Doc-right|gather-hidelist}}
gather-lists-collection-more-link-label: Link label for a more type link on the Special:GatherLists page.
gather-lists-more: Link label for more link at the bottom of a list of users existing collections.
gather-collection-more: Label for link at bottom of Gather collection when there are more than 50 items.
gather-add-to-another: Label for button at bottom of collection overlay for when you have more collections that you could potentially add to.
gather-watchstar-button-label: A label for the button to add to a collection.
